summary: REQ-36 appears implemented by adding a new primary-styled CTA in the Why Choose Us (FeaturesSection) directly under the specified paragraph and above the feature grid, linking to the provided YouTube URL. One extra behavior (opening in a new tab) was introduced that was not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: CTA link opens YouTube in a new tab via target="_blank" (and adds rel="noopener noreferrer").
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirement only specifies that clicking navigates to the YouTube URL; opening in a new tab is an additional behavior not requested.
